name: Linear Landscape 2021/04
description:
Generative drawing made by a swarm of autonomous particles guided by the colors of an input image. 
Part of an exploration that started back in 2010. The first iterations can be seen here: https://flickr.com/photos/solaas/albums/72157624193851901

4000 x 4000 px | Made with Processing

TW: @solaas | IG: @leonardo_solaas
